Hi *,

I've once again updated the start script for Windows:

:: 2006-09-03  Updated error handling (Max):
::             - Do justice to compulsory --admin switch (since 1.10.0)
::             - Handle missing JMX permissions file (it's not created
::               automatically on Windows as we have nothing like sed)
::             - No double confirmation for fixing permissions
::             - More verbose on errors

http://www.ifi.lmu.de/~schoefma/howto/run_heritrix_on_windows/heritrix.cmd

http://www.ifi.lmu.de/~schoefma/howto/run_heritrix_on_windows/heritrix_win_cmds.tar.gz

Max
